mapper.select: select faq.faq_no, faq.main_cate_no, faq.query_no, faq.title, faq.content, faq.path, faq.reg_dt, qc.name from gms_faq faq right outer join gms_query_cate qc on (faq.query_no = qc.query_no) order by query_no desc

select faq.faq_no, faq.main_cate_no , faq.query_no, faq.title, faq.content, faq.path, faq.reg_dt, qc.name from gms_faq faq right outer join gms_query_cate qc on (faq.query_no = qc.query_no) where faq.faq_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_faq(main_cate_no, query_no,title, content, path, reg_dt) values(#{maincateno}, #{queryno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{path}, NOW())
mapper.select: select count(*) from gms_faq faq right outer join gms_query_cate qc on (faq.query_no = qc.query_no)
SELECT faq.faq_no, faq.main_cate_no, faq.query_no, faq.title, faq.content, faq.path, faq.reg_dt, gqc.name gqcn FROM gms_faq faq, gms_query_cate gqc WHERE faq.query_no = gqc.query_no AND faq_no=#{no}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gms_faq
